title: Behavior Tree Plus
description: A set of useful BTTasks and BTDecorators to help you in your AI journey.
longDescription: An extension to the engine's lackluster base of built-in tasks and decorators. Contains highly customizable nodes that every ambitious AI-driven project needs - use them with various comparision operators, use float literals or blackboard keys, decide whether targets should pass line trace tests and more!
technicalDetails:
Features 16 highly customizable blueprints:

7 Decorators:

  • Random Chance - pass the test with provided probability. 
  • Actor Proximity - whether sufficient number of desired actors are detected in area.
  • Has Component - does provided actor have selected actor component?
  • Line Trace Test - check, if one blackboard key has unobstructed view of another.
  • Distance / Path Cost / Path Length Threshold - check, whether key actor fulfills our navigation requirements.

9 Tasks:

  • Clear Key - resets blackboard key to fit the IsSet condition.
  • Modify Gameplay Tag - manipulate an actor's gameplay tags.
  • Report Perception Event - create a Noise, Touch or Damage event with given parameters.
  • Spawn Cascade Particle - spawn a particle emitter at location or attached to selected target.
  • Spawn Niagara Particle - spawn a Niagara system at location or attached to blackboard key.
  • Teleport To - instantaneously teleport key to given location, with desired rotation in mind.
  • Find Actor By Distance / Path Cost / Path Length - overwrite a blackboard key with actor that satisfies our navigation needs.

And a comprehensive, 20-page documentation file.

Code Modules:

  •  BehaviorTreePlus [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints: 16

Number of C++ Classes: 16

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64-bit

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64-bit
